termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our
toast_missing_fields_desc: Please enter both email and password.
firebase_error_invalid_credential: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
firebase_error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
firebase_error_too_many_requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
firebase_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
form_username_desc: This is your public display name.
form_new_password_placeholder: Leave blank to keep current password
form_password_desc: Must be at least 8 characters long.
form_new_password_desc: Leave blank to keep your current password.
form_favorite_book_desc: Optional, but a great conversation starter!
form_interests_desc: Select at least one. This helps us find better matches for you.
form_current_photos_desc: The first photo is your main picture. Drag to reorder.
form_add_photos_desc: Add up to 10 photos. JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF accepted, max 5MB each.
form_photos_desc: Upload between 1 and 10 photos. JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF accepted, max 5MB each. The first photo will be your main picture.
form_sentence_placeholder: Write a short bio that captures your personality...
validation_photo_size: Each new file must be 5MB or less.
validation_bio_min: Sentence must be at least 10 characters.
validation_password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters if provided.
validation_personas_min: Please select at least one category for yourself.
validation_lookingfor_min: Please select at least one category you are looking for.
validation_name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation_username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters.
validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation_password_required: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation_interests_min: Please select at least one interest.
validation_accept_terms: You must accept the Terms of Use to continue.
validation_accept_privacy: You must accept the Privacy Policy to continue.
validation_photo_max_total: You can have a maximum of 10 photos. You have {{count}} and are trying to add {{add_count}}.
validation_photo_min_total: You must have at least one profile picture.
validation_date_invalid: The date entered is not valid (e.g., April 31st).
validation_age_min: You must be at least 18 years old.
validation_age_max: Age seems unlikely. Please check the year.
toast_password_update_success_desc: Your password has been changed successfully.
toast_auth_required_desc: You must be logged in to save.
toast_account_created_desc: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox.
toast_op_failed_desc: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
toast_error_requires_recent_login: This action is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Please log out and log back in to update your password.
toast_error_email_in_use: This email address is already registered. Please log in or use a different email.
toast_error_weak_password: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one with at least 8 characters.
toast_error_invalid_email_config: Could not send verification email due to a configuration issue (API key may be restricted). Please contact support.
toast_upload_failed_timeout: The photo upload timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
toast_upload_failed_unauthorized: You are not authorized to upload files. Please try logging in again.
toast_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred: {{message}}. Please try again.
dreamy_filters: Find your perfect match with our dreamy filters.
chooseLanguage: Choose the language for the application interface.
safety_tip_desc: Never share personal financial information. Be cautious with links and attachments.
notification_preferences_desc: Control how you get notified about new activity.
new_match_notifications_desc: Get notified when someone matches with you.
new_message_notifications_desc: Receive an alert when you get a new message.
notification_sound_desc: Play a sound for new notifications.
newMatchesDesc: Your match is waiting — say hi now!
no_sparks_yet: When you match with others, their messages will appear here.
